data.title: Ekta
data.descriptions: This is the application with the most users that I have ever developed. This application is an application used by Golkar to report on the latest activities/news from the realm of Indonesian politics, especially Golkar. Apart from news features, there are also several other features such as political classes, canvassing, membership cards, etc.

data.title: TemuPilih
data.descriptions: TemuPilih is an application that focuses on canvassing features in serving clients. In terms of features, it is similar to the Ekta application, however, there are no news features, political classes, etc. This application is used by canvassers to improve their performance.

data.title: Tasky
data.descriptions: This application is an internal company application that I developed for task management, attendance, company performance management, employee performance management and many more. This application is used by employees of PT. One Digital Technology

data.title: Portaless Saller
data.descriptions: Portaless Saller is a buying and selling application that focuses on services. There are 2 applications for Portaless, namely for the user side and for the seller/provider side. This application is still in the development stage.

data.title: Aqua Breeding
data.descriptions: Aqua Breeding is an application that I created to complete my undergraduate education at Jakarta State University. This application aims to help fish farmers, especially in the Bogor Regency area. The features in this application include feed management, sorting management, pond management, grading, etc.
